top.title: Russia's losses in Ukraine rise faster than ever as US pushes for peace deal
top.summary: A steep rise in soldiers' obituaries is documented by the BBC as part of its work in counting Russian war losses.

top.title: French right pushes for national tribute to film star Brigitte Bardot
top.summary: A petition for a national homage to Brigitte Bardot - who died on Sunday - attracts more than 23,000 signatures.

top.title: Trump hopes to reach phase two of Gaza ceasefire 'very quickly'
top.summary: The US president also warns Hamas will have "hell to pay" if it does not disarm,  after talks with Netanyahu.

top.title: China to crack down on AI firms to protect kids
top.summary: The draft regulations are aimed to address concerns around chatbots, which have surged in popularity in recent months.

top.title: James Bond game 007 First Light delayed to May 2026
top.summary: Dexter Original Sin actor Patrick Gibson will star as the British spy when the game releases on 27 May.

top.title: Many new UK drone users must take theory test before flying outside
top.summary: The Civil Aviation Authority reckons up to half a million people in the UK may be impacted by its new requirements.

title.#text: LG is announcing its own Frame-style TV at CES
GOG’s Steam-alternative PC game store is leaving CD Projekt, staying DRM-free
